question.title: Comparing documents between two indices in OpenSearch
question.body:
I have an old Java service that inserts data to Opensearch. And a new Java service, that uses different mechanism to insert the data. I want to make sure that I donâ€™t have any gaps, and the new data is equal to the old data.

I was wondering if there is a way to query Opensearch (about multiple documents), and get the results only of such comparison (I have thousands of documents to compare).
